page.title: 20MY FAMILY
page.content: My name is Alaxandra Bateman. I live in a village in Lincolnshire. My mother is a post lady. She gets up at six thirty to sort the mail and comes back at seven thirty to have breakfast and get us off to school. At eight thirty she delivers the mail. My father works in London and comes home at the weekends. Our house is up for sale. When it is sold we are moving down to Kent. My brother Andrew is 16 years old and goes to school in Gainsbrough, he takes 11 in shoes. My sister Adele is 14 years old. She has a paper round in the village. Her favourite group is WHAM! I am 11 years old. I rise at seven thirty and go to school at eight thirty. I go to school on my bicycle and get back at three-thirty. I go to bed at nine-thirty. I play the Piano.
